reviewText:
If you are having a hard time getting the shimmies you should get this dvd.
 It covers the more known/used shimmies. This is what it has: Introduction, Posture and warm up, conditioning and stretches, technique and exercises, 21 mins shimmy drills and finally cool down.  The shimmies covered are basic hip shimmy, egyptian, freeze, african, 3/4 up, 3/4 down with variations, shoulder twist and choochoo.  There are many shimmy dvds overthere.  This is like the one Bozenka has but Khalida takes more time explaining the technique and you also can drill/practice with it. Bozenka dvd finished each section in 2 NY mins. There is also one dvd called 21 shimmies and 1001 variations but it is too expensive and I don't need to know so many shimmies now ( I am a beginner),what I needed was a dvd that covered the more used shimmies with good explanation , exercises and drills at a affordable price, and this dvd has it all :) Thank you Khalida!

Si estas teniendo dificultad  con los shimmies yo te recomiendo este dvd.  existen muchos shimmies dvds en el mercado, por eje. el de Bosenka en solo 2 mins ella te muestra y explica la technica, con ese no vas a aprender nada, es solo presentacion, no drills, existe otro q se titula 21 shimmies con Layla pero esta un poquito caro y yo como principiante no necesito conocer tantos shimmies en este momento.  Yo solo queria un dvd a buen precio q cubriera los shimmies mas conocidos, q fuera claro en explicar, con ejercicios para fortalecer los musculos usados y con el cual yo pudiera practicar 30 mins todos los dias, este es exactamente ese dvd :) Quizas mas pa'alante compre el 21 shimmies cuando  ahora me quedo con este, tengo material suficiente para cubrir una bonita danza.  Kudos para Khalida, es muy clara explicando si yo le entiendo cualquiera puede entenderle :)
